alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 16 at 12:05AM CDT until August 16 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WEBB COUNTY... At 1205 AM CDT, emergency management reported flooding continues in the Laredo area. Between 4 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. No additional rainfall is expected and flooding will continue to diminish over the next hour. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Laredo, Rio Bravo, El Cenizo, United South High School, St Augustine High School South Laredo, Laredo International Airport, Laredo Community College, Texas A&M, Laredo Country Club, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo and Orvil. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
